bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: "You lingering sparse leaves of me." Holograph draft of poem, undated, signed.
bibl.orgName: The Henry W. and Albert A. Berg Collection of English and American Literature, New York Public Library, New York Public Library
bibl.note: Transcribed from digital images of the original.

lg.head: You tokens diminute and lorn
lg.l: You tokens diminute and lorn—(not now the verdant scents of May, nor July & clover bloom—no prints of August now;)
You pallid little banners, remnants valueless-you overstay'd of time,
You dear, soul dear, continued leaves, my hardest and my last.
